metadata.title: CVE-2023-39327 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: [Malicious files can cause the program to enter a large loop]

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-07-12').
insighttoolkit4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ghostscript package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
